Projects.title: üçè FoodApi
Projects.summarySP: Es una SPA donde se pueden ver distintas receta de cocina saludable, utilizando la api externa spoonacular, y a partir de ella se puede: Buscar recetas, filtrarlas, ordenarlas y crear nuevas recetas.
Projects.summaryEN: It is a Single Page Application where you can see different healthy cooking recipes, using the spoonacular external api, and from it you can: Search for recipes, filter them, order them and create new recipes.

Projects.title: ‚ö° PokemonApi
Projects.summarySP: Es una SPA donde se pueden ver los distintos Pokemon utilizando la api externa pokeapi y a partir de ella se puede: Buscar pokemon, filtrarlos, ordenarlos y crear pokemons nuevos.
Projects.summaryEN: It is a Single Page Application where you can see the different Pokemon using the external pokeapi api and from it you can: Search for pokemon, filter them, order them and create new pokemons.

Projects.summaryEN: ServiExpress is an online services retail store where you can buy different services, ask for quotes, or even publish the service that you offer. Each seller has their ranking according to the comments of other users, which allows us to know how reliable the person who provides a certain service is. You can even bookmark your preferred providers.
